mapper.select: select id,`name`,keyname,filepath,status,order_status orderStatus,pay_status payStatus,req_type reqType,version,test_status testStatus,notifystr,cd_status cdStatus from pay_client_model where `name`=#{name} or keyname=#{keyname} limit 1

select id,`name`,keyname,filepath,status,order_status orderStatus,pay_status payStatus,req_type reqType,version,test_status testStatus,notifystr,cd_status cdStatus from pay_client_model where (`name`=#{name} or keyname=#{keyname}) and id <> #{id} limit 1
mapper.update: update pay_client_model set `name`=#{name}, status=#{status}, order_status=#{orderStatus}, pay_status=#{payStatus}, req_type=#{reqType}, version=version+1, test_status=#{testStatus}, cd_status=#{cdStatus}, json=#{json} ,notifystr=#{notifystr} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from pay_client_model where id in (${_parameter})
